accessibility_support_other: We always ask if anyone has specific needs and always aim to modify or adjust to suit people's needs. We also follow accessible presentation practices.
description: Who said accessibility testing is not a team sport? Learn some quick and easy tests that will uncover common accessibility issues we see in websites. This course is for any digital professional interested in accessibility testing.
platforms: Our courses are normally conducted via Zoom but we are flexible to the needs of attendees.
prerequisites: Basic knowledge of HTML, CSS and web developer tools required
title: Testing web accessibility for teams
topics: Using automated and manual testing techniques
Using tools to check contrast and colour usage
Identifying different image types and check accessible alternatives for images
Checking content structure is logical and meaningful
Making sure all tasks can be completed using a keyboard
Checking form labels and instructions are clear and coded correctly.
